proj.zoie.api.indexing
接口 IndexingEventListener

所有已知实现类：
DefaultIndexingEventListener, ZoieIndexingStatusAdmin
public interface IndexingEventListener

experimental api . Call-back for indexing events.

嵌套类摘要
static class IndexingEventListener.IndexingEvent
          Indexing event abstraction.
 
方法摘要
 void handleIndexingEvent(IndexingEventListener.IndexingEvent evt)
          Handler for indexing events
 void handleUpdatedDiskVersion(String version)
          Handler for updated disk version
 

方法详细信息

handleIndexingEvent

void handleIndexingEvent(IndexingEventListener.IndexingEvent evt)
Handler for indexing events

参数：
evt - event to be handled.

handleUpdatedDiskVersion

void handleUpdatedDiskVersion(String version)
Handler for updated disk version

参数：
version - new disk version
